name: My Laundry Manager Shop
description:
My laundry manager shop is a multiple level time management game. In this game you need server a lot of customers queuing up in the store for laundry service like clothes cleaning, drying & ironing. Serve each customer in time to get coins on cash counter and complete levels. Serve more and more customers to unlock washing machines and other stuff. Every next level presents more challenges & excitement.

Features:

- 30 challenging time management based levels.
- Complete & deliver clothes washing, drying & ironing orders.
- Deliver order before time to get more coins.
- Unlock multiple washing machines & stuff
- Manage the whole store process from getting order to delivering.
- Manage cash counter.
- Addictive & Exciting game play.
